analysis.description:
PIXToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/1/0x8effd494eb698cc399af6231fccd39e08fd20b15.sol#446-454) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > coinTradeStart) (/unique_chucks/1/0x8effd494eb698cc399af6231fccd39e08fd20b15.sol#450-451)

PIXToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/1/0x8effd494eb698cc399af6231fccd39e08fd20b15.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > coinTradeStart) (/unique_chucks/1/0x8effd494eb698cc399af6231fccd39e08fd20b15.sol)

PIXToken.getCurrentState (/unique_chucks/1/0x8effd494eb698cc399af6231fccd39e08fd20b15.sol#249-261) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > day3Start && block.timestamp <= saleEnd (/unique_chucks/1/0x8effd494eb698cc399af6231fccd39e08fd20b15.sol#258-261)
	- block.timestamp > day2Start && block.timestamp <= day3Start (/unique_chucks/1/0x8effd494eb698cc399af6231fccd39e08fd20b15.sol#256-261)
	- block.timestamp > publicSaleStart && block.timestamp <= day2Start (/unique_chucks/1/0x8effd494eb698cc399af6231fccd39e08fd20b15.sol#251-261)
	- block.timestamp < publicSaleStart (/unique_chucks/1/0x8effd494eb698cc399af6231fccd39e08fd20b15.sol#250-261)

PIXToken.allocateReserveAndFounderTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x8effd494eb698cc399af6231fccd39e08fd20b15.sol#347-401) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > year2Unlock && ! allocated2Year (/unique_chucks/1/0x8effd494eb698cc399af6231fccd39e08fd20b15.sol#365-401)
	- block.timestamp > year4Unlock && ! allocated4Year (/unique_chucks/1/0x8effd494eb698cc399af6231fccd39e08fd20b15.sol#384-401)
	- block.timestamp > saleEnd && ! allocatedFounders (/unique_chucks/1/0x8effd494eb698cc399af6231fccd39e08fd20b15.sol#351-401)
	- block.timestamp > year1Unlock && ! allocated1Year (/unique_chucks/1/0x8effd494eb698cc399af6231fccd39e08fd20b15.sol#357-401)
	- block.timestamp > year3Unlock && ! allocated3Year (/unique_chucks/1/0x8effd494eb698cc399af6231fccd39e08fd20b15.sol#373-401)
